ygData.messageBody:
Isn't uber german for super?

Dicey

From: Trizzen Do'Trevan [mailto:trizzen@...]
Sent: Monday, January 03, 2000 8:47 PM

Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] uber question...


From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>

heheh, silly question, but where exactly does uber
come from? As in uber-mob? Obviously it is a hard mob,
but where the heck does the word uber actually come
from?
>
> Griffins are about the same lvl as giants but have
> about half the HP's, but
> they hit a bit harder than giants...not really an
> issue with fear. However
> if you're going after uber-mobs you might as well do
> giants, as the loot is
> infinitely better (griffs drop like 6p tops, and the
> occasional feather/eye)
>
